conbody.p: executorsoverviewAn executor stage executes a task when it receives an event. Use executor stages as part of an event stream to perform event-driven, pipeline-related tasks, such as moving a fully-written file when a destination closes it.
For more information about event handling, see .

You can use the following executors in a pipeline:
HDFS File Metadata - Renames or moves closed files or defines file permissions upon receiving an event record.
Hive Query - Runs a user-defined Hive or Impala query upon receiving an event record.
JDBC Query - Runs a user-defined query upon receiving an event record.
MapReduce - Starts the specified MapReduce job upon receiving an event record.
